R0010.title: Unauthorized Third-Party Top-Up Services
R0010.definition: Providing low-price top-up services that bypass official legitimate recharge channels.
R0010.description: Obtaining low-cost top-up resources through promotional, non-compliant, or illegal means, and offering top-up services externally.
R0010.influence: Affects the normal operations and profitability of game operators.
